column4: Alright, WHAT THE HELL?! I'm getting so goddamned sick of this! Firefox is using monospace for its GUI font. I've completely removed and reinstalled it, and it STILL does it! What is going on?!
Hell is in the bible. I don't see how it could be offensive.
calm yourself, then ask again.
Channel rules. Respect them.
I don't care, show some respect or you won't get any.
You try dealing with this for three months and then being calm about it.
that's no excuse. If you are unwilling to calm yourself, there are those who will show you which way to 'forceful' help is at.
My apologies. Thanks for spamming the channel to death in reprimand.
is the problem similar to this one? https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/firefox/+bug/36585
Not in the slightest. I've already been through the bugs.
well, you're going to have to be a bit more specific as to what the real problem is instead of brushing aside any attempts to help.
so why not quit firefox, empty the folder out, and try launching it again?
I completely removed .mozilla, completely removed the firefox package, reinstalled, no fix.
mkay
http://www.draconicus.com/monofox.jpg
that doesn't look like the default firefox theme...
It is. My system theme does that.
'system theme'? you mean gnome?
No, I mean Xfce. :P
have you tried fluxbox?
No. Leave me alone.
sod off.
